channel.title: [Delta] Help with combat + firecape [Delta]
channel.description:
Hi guys, first post i was a member of google but theyre community sucks. Anyway onto the point i have a delta based source proper GS stances claw specs GS specs and everything REALLY great server. But theres three problems i have,
1) It takes ages to attack someone/NPC once youve already clicked attack. Anyway to fix this?
[s]2) if you get a firecape and wear it, logout, then log back in, the firecape disappears?[/s]
3) I get alot of lag on my server, no players just me and a mate. Is this my computer and if i buy a vps will this be fixed? or is this the source. Because it does have customs (wouldnt know how to remove)
Any ideas?

item.title: [Delta] Help with combat + firecape [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Maxedstats Maxedstats
item.description:
@Maxedstats wrote:

Right, ive fixed firecape so it only disappears if they havent killed jad. FTW

Ive also forgot to add another problem, i get alot of lag on my server, no players just me and a mate. Is this my computer and if i buy a vps will this be fixed? or is this the source. Because it does have customs like bandos warspear but i wouldnt know how to remove them, only been coding for around a month

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Help with combat + firecape [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

  1. search for 6570 ( as many times as u might need ) in client.java , if you are not stupid , you will figure it out.
